zh.doc.AliyunVoice.7077010-2: 通知配置可以结合通知配置为告警消息通知提供支撑。也可以用于系统中其他自定义模块的调用。
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.7077010-4: 阿里云服务地域与对应的RegionID。请根据购买的阿里云服务器地域进行选择。
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.7077010-5: 用于程序通知方式调用云服务费API的用户标识和秘钥获取路径：“阿里云管理控制台”--“用户头像”--“”--“AccessKey管理”--“查看”

en.doc.AliyunVoice.7077010-2: Notification configuration can be combined with notification configuration to provide support for alarm message notifications. It can also be used for calling other custom modules in the system.
en.doc.AliyunVoice.7077010-4: Alibaba Cloud service region and corresponding RegionID. Please choose based on the region of the purchased Alibaba Cloud server.
en.doc.AliyunVoice.7077010-5: The user identifier and key acquisition path for calling the cloud service fee API through program notification: "Alibaba Cloud Management Console" - "User Profile" - "" - "AccessKey Management" - "View"
